title: Rhizosphere regulation with cerium oxide nanomaterials promoted carrot taproot thickening
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00334A, Paper
Mengjun Zhao, Feiran Chen, Xiaona Li, Chuanxi Wang, Xuesong Cao, Liya Jiao, Le Yue, Zhenyu Wang
Nanomaterials (NMs) provide great potential for sustainable development by regulating rhizosphere processes to improve crop productivity.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
